body_html:
You have to register kernels for a lot of standard ops on your KPU device.

(NoOp, Variable, Assign, Identity, etc). I think the generic implementations are registerable via header files like variable_op.h etc -- look for the GPU kernel registrations to get a sense of what you probably want to do for your KPU. It's likely that most of these do not require a custom implementation on your device.

It's likely that most of these do not require a custom implementation on your device.
body:
You have to register kernels for a lot of standard ops on your KPU device.

(NoOp, Variable, Assign, Identity, etc).  I think the generic implementations are registerable via header files like variable_op.h etc -- look for the GPU kernel registrations to get a sense of what you probably want to do for your KPU.  It's likely that most of these do not require a custom implementation on your device.
